comment._content: William Graves Sharp (March 14, 1859 – November 17, 1922) was the American ambassador to France from 1914 to 1919. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Graves_Sharp www.ourstory.info/library/2-ww1/Sharp/memoirsTC.html

comment._content: Thanks B-59, we include his full name in this record and the other Bain photos showing his home.
